title: "‘Placenta-on-a-chip’ mimics malaria-infected nutrient exchange between mother-fetus"
excerpt: "Combining microbiology with engineering technologies, this novel 3D model uses a single microfluidic chip to study the complicated processes that take place in malaria-infected placenta as well as other placenta-related diseases and pathologies."
